content: yarn over pull through yarn over pull through 2 loops yarn over and pull through all 4 loops picot stitch picot st chain 3 slip_stitch back into first chain video help of how i make the picot stitch https //youtube com/shorts/lwp7eojunou feature=share additional notes slip stitches do not count as stitches if a row/round starts with a chain 1 or chain 2 that is not counted as a stitch unless stated otherwise us terms used throughout at the end of every round there s going to be a note with the stitch count so you can keep track of your work easily and avoid any mistakes it s written in a different color in bold notes are written in a different color in brackets to help you through the pattern or tell you which stitches to work into or skip you can start each round as i did in the pattern or you can use a standing stitch or chains it s totally up to you a full video tutorial is available here https //youtu be/3_vr8dttcqk 2 k a m e crochet designs 2025 by krisztina anna edomer all rights reserved instructions to start with c1 make a magic_ring video help of how to make a magic_ring https //youtu be/xi4r2axwukg si=hxyiwkkjfdhkrzgq round 1 chain 2 doesn t count as a st 3 double_crochet chain 2 8 times into the ring then pull the ring tight and join with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet fasten_off 24 double_crochet 8 x chain 2 space round 2 note in this round we only work in the chain 2 spaces between the 3dccl sts join c2 in any chain 2 space from previous round beg3dccl chain 2 3 dccl in same space 3dccl chain 2 3dccl in next chain 2 space 7 times join with a slip_stitch in first 3dccl 16 x 3dccl 8 x chain 2 space round 3 slip_stitch in chain 2 space between the 3dccl sts chain 1 1 double_crochet+picot st 8 times in same space slip_stitch between the next 2 3dccl sts 1 double_crochet+picot st 8 times in next chain 2 space slip_stitch between the next 2 3dccl sts 7 times do not fasten_off 8 slip_stitch 64 double_crochet 64 picot st finishing since you haven t fastened off after round 3 chain 15 and then cut the yarn with color c2 make a slip knot and chain 10 fasten_off and leave the ends short on both sides fold the butterfly in half so the wings line up wrap the chain 15 strand around the center of the folded piece to form the body while doing this place the chain 10 piece underneath the wrap these will be the antennae finally sew the end of the chain 15 down at the base to secure everything in place fasten_off weave in ends 3 k a m e crochet designs 2025 by krisztina anna edomer all rights reserved thank you for
